channel.title: Help on blocking a 508 item!

item.title: Help on blocking a 508 item!
item.dc:creator: @Johnny2 Johnny2
item.description:
@Johnny2 wrote:

Here is my problem in my 508 server I would like to block Dragon claws and i have not coded in a long time so i forgot and i have coded this before so were and what would i have to insert in this code please help.

					if (cmd[0].equals("item")) {
			int itemID = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
			int itemAmount = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]);
			if (p.wildernessZone(p.absX, p.absY)) {
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while inside of the wilderness.");
				return;
			}
